bug.titlePlaceholder: (Ex.) The completion message of the application form is not displayed
bug.phenomenonPlaceholder: (Ex.) The completion message is not displayed even if the send button is pressed, and it is not possible to know if the send was successful
bug.goalPlaceholder: (Ex.) The completion message is displayed within 3 seconds after sending, and the user is not anxious

improve.titlePlaceholder: (Ex.) The weekly report takes too long to complete
improve.phenomenonPlaceholder: (Ex.) The weekly report takes 2-3 hours each time, and the work is not done in the main business
improve.goalPlaceholder: (Ex.) The report creation time is shortened to within 30 minutes, and the work of the person in charge is reduced

other.titlePlaceholder: (Ex.) The response rules are different for each department
other.phenomenonPlaceholder: (Ex.) The response rules are different for each person, and the explanation to the customer is different
other.goalPlaceholder: (Ex.) Document the common rules, so that anyone who responds can give the same explanation

common.causePlaceholder: (Opt.) Hypotheses about the occurrence conditions and causes
common.solutionPlaceholder: (Opt.) If there are any ideas for countermeasures, please write them down

problemProgress.title: Progress by Problem
problemProgress.tooltip: This value is the average progress rate (progress) of tasks in that Problem. The progress rate of tasks is automatically updated according to the columns on the Board.
problemProgress.subtitle: When columns are divided into "Not started / In progress / In review / Done" etc., the progress rate of tasks in that column is averaged and displayed here.

tooltips.avgLeadTime30d: The average number of days from creation to completion of tasks completed within the last 30 days (status is done).
tooltips.lateRateThisWeek: The percentage of tasks with a due date this week (JST month-day) that have not been completed by the due date.
tooltips.avgLeadTime30dPersonal: The average number of days from creation to completion of tasks completed within the last 30 days (status is done) assigned to yourself.
tooltips.lateRateThisWeekPersonal: The percentage of tasks with a due date this week (JST month-day) assigned to yourself that have not been completed by the due date.

reports.title: Reports / Progress summaries
reports.subtitle: Manage weekly or daily progress reports generated by AI or written manually. Editing and deleting reports is only possible for reports created by yourself.
reports.subsubtitle: Weekly report generation is created based on the data from the Analytics page, and you can choose from two types: personal tasks and project-wide tasks.

recurrence.title: Recurrence Task Function
recurrence.stopConfirm: Stop generating future tasks? Existing ones will remain.
recurrence.anchorRequired: A first due date is required when enabling recurrence.
recurrence.invalidDate: Please enter the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
recurrence.stopHint: Stop the recurrence before deleting the template.
recurrence.dueDisabled: The due date is managed automatically for recurrence templates.
recurrence.tagDisabled: Tags are copied to future instances from the template.
recurrence.stopAndDeleteConfirm: Stop recurrence and delete the template. Existing tasks will remain.
recurrence.endAfterStart: The end date must be after the start date (first due date).
recurrence.hintShort: Creation rules: Daily=create on the same day at 0:05, Weekly=create on the next day after the previous due date, Monthly (1-6 months)=create on the next day after the previous due date, Monthly (7 months or more)=create 6 months before the next due date. Tasks after the end date are not created.
